Display an image and enlarge it on click: Display an image and enlarge it on click.
This is the image that is displayed if n: This is the image that is displayed if no image is uploaded.
The link of the external image.
Whether the image is rendered as a backg: Whether the image is rendered as a background. More content can be put inside, while design properties will have no effect.
Alternative text of the image for access: Alternative text of the image for accessibility purposes.
Auto will keep the aspect ratio of the i: Auto will keep the aspect ratio of the image.
The size of the icon in pixels.
Image will never get larger than its ori: Image will never get larger than its original size. It can become smaller.
